Description: Available Sept 1. Also have vacant 2 bed at property for $3900. No Broker fee! Huge 2 bed, 2 bath, (1000 s.f.), with W/D in unit, one block to Central Square, with balcony, fireplace, newly renovated granite and stainless kitchen, with kitchen bar, central A/C, gas heat. Underground garage parking available for $200 per month. Indoor and outdoor bike storage. Only first and last month rent to move in. Grad. students require additional security deposit but a co-signer is not needed. No broker fee and no application fee. Dogs OK with a $75 per month fee and security deposit. Please mail Mark if you have any questions, would like to set up a showing, or see a video.
